message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable item. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering it to you for $18000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the item, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value of the item as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $14000 is a fair price for the item. I would like to stick with this counteroffer.

I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a mutually beneficial price. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $16500.
I understand your position, but I believe $14000 remains a reasonable price for the item. I would like to keep my counteroffer at this amount.
